"The AC Shop":
"About the AC Shop

You can buy items only available at the AC Shop with ARKS Cash (AC).

Selecting the Buy AC button opens your browser and takes you to the site where you can purchase AC (Japanese cards only).

For those outside Japan, you can buy ARKS Cash through PSO2es, or through various other sources such as WebMoney codes.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_ac>"
